article_title: Five-Star MSU Signee Jeffrey Simmons Issues Apology After Hitting A Woman
article_text:
--Noxubee County football standout and Mississippi State signee Jeffrey Simmons issued an apology via Facebook after a video surfaced of him striking a women several times.

Simmons along with another unidentified woman are seen hitting the victim in the video. The five - star member of the 2016 Bulldogs recruiting class took full responsibility for his actions via his Facebook post. He claims the woman made remarks about a deceased family member.

article_metadata.author: Ashley ShahAhmadi
